Name: ArcGIS Map Image Layer
Description: The Image Layer from URL app is one of the most basic Map apps in the SDK for .NET using an  ArcGISMapImageLayer basemap from an ArcGIS Online service URL. It shows how to add a MapView, Map and  ArcGISMapImageLayer to the app's XAML from an ArcGIS Online service URL and bind that to a Basemap. The Basemap is used to create a Map which is used inside of the MapView. By default, this map supports basic zooming and panning operations.
